```{r cheating count}
d <- qualtrics2

d$condition_1or2 <- NA
d$condition_1or2[which(d$Condition == 1)] <- "self_alone"
d$condition_1or2[which(d$Condition == 2)] <- "self_other"


d$X3 <- as.numeric(d$X3)
d$cheat_alone <- d$X3
d$cheat_other <- d$X3b

d$cheat <- NA
d$cheat[which(d$cheat_alone == 1 | d$cheat_other == 1 )] <- "yes"
d$cheat[which(d$cheat_alone == 2 | d$cheat_other == 2 )] <- "no"
```


```{r}
cheatfrequency <- d %>% group_by(condition_1or2, cheat) %>% dplyr::summarise(freq=n())
print(cheatfrequency)
